reference to interest rates being charged on loans provided by the U.S. and Canadian governments was "inappropriate." "I regret the remark," Sergio Marchionne said in a statement posted on Chrysler's website. As the only parties willing to underwrite the risk associated with Chrysler's recovery plan, the two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions.
